name: KAIJI VR -THE NIGHTMARE BRIDGE
description:
Experience the thrilling world of Japan’s mega-hit manga Kaiji series!
The player will play the role of Kaiji, and get to virtually go into the famous manga scenes that fans know so well.
You will actually be Kaiji himself and go through the hopeless despair of crossing the deadly bridge…

NOTE
This game is VR content.
VR goggles are required.

Regarding how to use VR goggles,
Please carefully read the instruction manual and precautions on each VR goggles and use it properly.
Be sure to check the safety of your surroundings, and please sit during play.

If you feel sick, nausea, dizziness, visibility blur etc.,
Please stop playing immediately.
